title: Majo-san to Issho
description:
A powerful, monster-slaying witch comes to a village where all the women have been abducted by a powerful monster living in the nearby forest. During her stay, the witch makes a young boy living in the village, who can also use magic, be her bodyguard.

(Source: Deus Ex Scans)

matches.title: A Story About a Boy Scouted to Be a Model
